entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 5:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 6.3°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 49 %
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: W 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon and ending late in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
